TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ButtonField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase

summary.span: 表示数据绑定控件中以按钮形式显示的字段。

span.span: Represents a field that is displayed as a button in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由数据绑定控件 (如和) 以显示将显示每个记录的按钮。The class is used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display a button for each record that is displayed. 根据使用它的数据绑定控件以不同方式显示对象。The object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如，控制显示对象为一列，而控件将其显示为一行。For example, the control displays a object as a column, while the control displays it as a row. 单击按钮字段中的按钮引发命令事件的父数据绑定控件。Clicking a button in a button field raises the command event of the parent data-bound control. 你可以提供要执行的命令按钮单击通过提供用于命令事件的事件处理程序时的自定义例程。You can provide a custom routine to perform when a command button is clicked by providing an event handler for the command event. > [!NOTE] > 控件都将引发事件，而控件都将引发事件。The control raises the event, while the control raises the event. 若要确定引发命令事件的记录的索引，请使用事件自变量传递给命令事件的数据绑定控件的属性。To determine the index of the record that raises the command event, use the property of the event argument that is passed to the command event for the data-bound control. 类自动填充具有适当的索引值的属性。The class automatically populates the property with the appropriate index value. 若要指定要显示的按钮的类型，使用属性。To specify the type of button to display, use the property. 在显示链接或命令按钮，使用属性来指定要显示在按钮的标题。When displaying a link or command button, use the property to specify the caption to display in the buttons. > [!NOTE] > 如果你设置属性、 中的所有按钮共享相同的标题。If you set the property, all buttons in a share the same caption. 或者，你可以将绑定给数据源中的字段的对象。Alternatively, you can bind the object to a field in a data source. 这使你可以显示不同的标题中的按钮对象。This allows you to display different captions for the buttons in the object. 指定字段中的值用于按钮的文本标题。The values that are in the specified field are used for the text captions of the buttons. 设置属性将绑定给数据源中的字段的对象。Set the property to bind a object to a field in a data source. 当显示图像按钮时，使用属性来指定要显示有关中的按钮的图像对象。When displaying an image button, use the property to specify the image to display for the buttons in the object. > [!NOTE] > 中的所有按钮对象共享相同的映像。All buttons in a object share the same image. 可以隐藏通过设置数据绑定控件中的对象属性`false`。You can hide a object in a data-bound control by setting the property to `false`. 对象允许你自定义其页眉和页脚部分。The object allows you to customize its header and footer sections. 若要在页眉或页脚部分中显示标题，将设置或属性，分别。To display a caption in the header or footer section, set the or properties, respectively. 而不是在标头部分中显示文本，你可以通过设置内显示图像属性。Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the property. 若要隐藏中的标头部分对象，设置属性`false`。To hide the header section in a object, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 某些数据绑定控件 (如控件) 可显示或隐藏控件的整个标头部分。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 这些数据绑定控件不支持单个按钮字段的属性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual button field. 若要显示或隐藏的数据绑定控件的整个标头部分 （如果可用），请使用`ShowHeader`控件的属性。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control (if available), use the `ShowHeader` property for the control. 您还可以自定义的外观通过设置字段的不同部分的样式属性的对象 （如字体颜色、 背景色等）。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出不同的样式属性。The following table lists the different style properties. |样式属性Style property|样式设置The style settings for| |--------------------|----------------------------| ||子 Web 服务器控件的。The child Web server controls of the .| ||页脚部分。The footer section of the .| ||标头部分。The header section of the .| ||中的数据项。The data items in the .| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象中显示的列中的命令按钮控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to display a column of command buttons in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/CS/buttonfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/VB/buttonfieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use the constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 此构造函数通常用时将字段添加到的动态创建的数据绑定控件。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要添加动态对象的数据绑定控件，创建一个新对象、 设置其属性，并将其添加到数据绑定控件的字段集合。To add a object dynamically to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the field collection for the data-bound control. 例如，如果你使用控件中，添加对象传递给集合。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 尽管你可以添加字段动态到数据绑定控件，应声明为静态，字段，以及然后能显示或隐藏，为相应。Although you can add fields dynamically to a data-bound control, fields should be declared statically, and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 静态声明所有你字段会减小父数据绑定控件的视图状态的大小。Statically declaring all of your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.#ctor 构造函数添加动态对象控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.#ctor constructor to add a object dynamically to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldCtor/CS/buttonfieldctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldCtor/VB/buttonfieldctorvb.aspx#1)]

.property instance string CommandName
Public Overridable Property CommandName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ CommandName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串表示当单击 对象中的按钮时要执行的操作。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that represents the action to perform when a button in a object is clicked.

value.span: 当单击 中的按钮时要执行的操作的名称。

span.span: The name of the action to perform when a button in the is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用相关联的命令名称，如属性`"Add"`或`"Remove"`，与中的按钮对象。Use the property to associate a command name, such as `"Add"` or `"Remove"`, with the buttons in the object. 你可以设置属性设置为任何字符串，标识要在单击该命令按钮时执行的操作。You can set the property to any string that identifies the action to perform when the command button is clicked. 你可以随后以编程方式确定事件处理程序中的命令名称并执行相应的操作。You can then programmatically determine the command name in an event handler and perform the appropriate actions. > [!NOTE] > 中的所有按钮对象共享相同的命令名称。All buttons in a object share the same command name. 数据绑定控件识别某些命令名称和自动引发以及处理控件的相应事件。Data-bound controls recognize certain command names and automatically raise and handle the appropriate events for the control. 下面的命令名被识别：The following command names are recognized: - `"Cancel"` - `"Delete"` - `"Edit"` - `"Insert"` - `"New"` - `"Page"` - `"Select"` - `"Sort"` - `"Update"` 若要调用分页，请设置到`"Page"`和所包含的控制转移到`"First"`， `"Last"`， `"Prev"`， `"Next"`，或页号。To invoke paging, set the to `"Page"` and the of the contained control to `"First"`, `"Last"`, `"Prev"`, `"Next"`, or a page number. 但是，由于为控件始终是整数行索引，控件不适合调用分页。However, since the for a control is always the integer row index, a control is not suitable for invoking paging. 同样，尽管你可以调用通过设置排序到`"Sort"`、属性控件始终是整数行索引。Similarly, while you can invoke sorting by setting the to `"Sort"`, the property for a control is always the integer row index. 为此，控件不适合调用排序。For this reason, a control is not suitable for invoking sorting. 对于自定义命令名称，如`"Add"`和`"Remove"`，你需要编写事件代码以检查的命令名称并执行某些自定义操作。For custom command names, such as `"Add"` and `"Remove"`, you need to write the event code to check the command name and perform some custom action. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . > [!NOTE] > 并非所有的命令名称所识别的每个数据绑定控件。Not all command names are recognized by every data-bound controls. 例如，`"New"`无法识别的控件和`"Select"`无法识别的控件。For example, `"New"` is not recognized by the control and `"Select"` is not recognized by the control. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定中的按钮的命令名称对象控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a command name for the buttons in a object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/CS/buttonfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/VB/buttonfieldvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Copies the properties of the current object to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是使用一个帮助器方法方法复制当前的属性-派生对象转换对象由方法。The method is a helper method that is used by the method to copy the properties of the current -derived object to the object that was created by the method.

para.span: 在重写方法在派生类中，调用基的类，以确保对象的所有属性，将都复制的方法。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, call the method of the base class to ensure that all properties of the object are copied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是使用一个帮助器方法方法的基类，来创建一个空要将当前的属性复制到的对象-派生对象。The method is a helper method that is used by the method of the base class to create an empty object to which to copy the properties of the current -derived object.

summary.span: 获取或设置数据字段的名称，该数据字段的值绑定到 控件的 属性，此控件由 对象呈现。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the data field for which the value is bound to the property of the control that is rendered by the object.

value.span: 要绑定到 的字段名称。

span.span: The name of the field to bind to the .

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性对象设置为或值，请使用属性来指定要绑定到的字段名称对象。When the property of a object is set to the or value, use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the object. 字段的值将显示为中的按钮的文本对象。The values of the field are then displayed as the text for the buttons in the object. （可选） 可以设置显示的文本格式通过设置属性。Optionally, you can format the displayed text by setting the property. 而不是使用属性将绑定对象移到一个字段从数据源，你可以使用属性显示的文本中的按钮的静态文本对象。Instead of using the property to bind a object to a field from a data source, you can use the property to display static text for the text of the buttons in the object. 当属性时，每个按钮共享相同的标题。When the property is used, each button shares the same caption. > [!NOTE] > 如果和都设置属性，属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要在中显示的字段列控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which field to display in a column of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonFieldDataTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldDataTextField/CS/buttonfielddatatextfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonFieldDataTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldDataTextField/VB/buttonfielddatatextfieldvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string DataTextFormatString { get; set; }
.property instance string DataTextFormatString
Public Overridable Property DataTextFormatString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DataTextFormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置字符串，该字符串指定字段值的显示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.

value.span: 指定字段值显示格式的格式字符串。

span.span: A format string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚无特殊格式设置应用于该字段值。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the field value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的值中显示的自定义显示格式对象。Use the property to specify a custom display format for the values that are displayed in the object. 如果未设置属性，该字段的值将显示不带任何特殊格式。If the property is not set, the value for the field is displayed without any special formatting. > [!NOTE] > 应用格式字符串，则仅当属性设置。The format string is applied only when the property is set. 格式字符串可以是任意文本字符串，并且通常包含字段的值的占位符。The format string can be any literal string and usually includes a placeholder for the value for the field. 例如，在格式字符串`"Item Value: {0}"`、`{0}`占位符将被替换的字段的值，在显示时对象。For example, in the format string `"Item Value: {0}"`, the `{0}` placeholder is replaced with the value for the field when it is displayed in the object. 格式字符串的其余部分将显示为文字文本。The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text. > [!NOTE] > 如果格式字符串不包括一个占位符，数据源的字段的值不是包括在最终的显示文本。If the format string does not include a placeholder, the value for the field from the data source is not included in the final display text. 占位符包含两个部分，以冒号分隔，在大括号，在窗体中进行包装 { `A` : `Bxx` }。The placeholder consists of two parts, separated by a colon and wrapped in braces, in the form { `A` : `Bxx` }. 冒号前的值 (`A`常规示例中) 从零开始的参数列表中，指定的字段值的索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the index for the field value in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 这`A`参数是格式设置的语法的一部分。This `A` parameter is part of the formatting syntax. 由于每个单元中只有一个字段值，此值只能设置为 0。Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0. 冒号和冒号后面的值是可选的。The colon and the values after the colon are optional. 冒号后面的字符 (`B`常规示例中) 指定要在其中显示值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format in which to display the value. 下表列出了常见的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以货币格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科学记数 （指数） 格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|采用固定格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以常规格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|采用数字格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 除`X`，格式字符不区分大小写。Except for `X`, the format characters are not case sensitive. `X`格式字符在指定的情况下显示的十六进制字符。The `X` format character displays the hexadecimal characters in the case that is specified. 格式字符后的值 (`xx`常规示例中) 指定的有效位数或小数位数显示数量。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 例如，在格式字符串`"{0:F2}"`显示一个带两位小数定点数。For example, the format string `"{0:F2}"` displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. 有关设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定字段的值的自定义显示格式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom display format for the values of a field. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonFieldDataTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldDataTextField/CS/buttonfielddatatextfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonFieldDataTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldDataTextField/VB/buttonfielddatatextfieldvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The field value to format.

summary.span: 设定 对象内的单元格中的指定字段值。

span.span: Formats the specified field value for a cell in the object.

returns.span: 已转换为由 属性指定的格式的字段值。

span.span: The field value converted to the format specified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是用于转换字段值由指定的格式与帮助器方法属性。The method is a helper method that is used to transform a field value to the format that is specified by the property.

para.span: 在扩展类，可以重写方法来执行自定义格式设置例程。

span.span: When extending the class, you can override the method to perform a custom formatting routine.

span.span: Gets or sets the image to display for each button in the object.

value.span: 要为 中每个按钮显示的图像。

span.span: The image to display for each button in the .

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性对象设置为值，请使用属性来指定要显示每个按钮的图像。When the property of a object is set to the value, use the property to specify the image to display for each button. 只要客户端浏览器支持该格式，此映像可以是任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等）。This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client browser supports that format. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要显示在每个按钮的图像对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify an image to display for each button in the object. 若要显示此代码示例，你必须提供你自己的映像。For this code example to display, you must provide your own image. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonFieldImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldImageUrl/CS/buttonfieldimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonFieldImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldImageUrl/VB/buttonfieldimageurlvb.aspx#1)]

returns.span: ，指示控件无需重新绑定到数据。

span.span: , which indicates the control does not need to rebind to the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用由数据控件与其对象所关联以执行基本的对象初始化的字段，该字段添加到行集合之前的实例。The method is called by the data control with which the object is associated to perform basic object initialization for instances of the field, before the field is ever added to a rows collection. 数据控件，如和，调用方法在其`CreateChildControls`方法之前的其他方法，如`CreateRow`，调用来使用数据创建特定行。Data controls, such as and , call the method in their `CreateChildControls` methods before other methods, such as `CreateRow`, are called to create specific rows with data. 调用方法在你编写的自定义的数据绑定控件时，使用对象执行基本初始化对象。Call The method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to perform basic initialization for a object. 实现此方法，如果你-派生的类型要求任何对象初始化之前它将填充对象与数据或控件的方法。Implement this method if your -derived type requires any object initialization before it populates objects with data or controls in the method.

para.span: 应重写方法，并且返回，如果该字段需要数据绑定在回发时要正常工作的字段的顺序执行。

span.span: You should override the method and return , if the field requires that data binding be performed on postback in order for the field to work correctly.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void InitializeCell (System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell cell, System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCellType cellType, System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState rowState, int rowIndex);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void InitializeCell(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell cell, valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCellType cellType, valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState rowState, int32 rowIndex) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub InitializeCell (cell As DataControlFieldCell, cellType As DataControlCellType, rowState As DataControlRowState, rowIndex As Integer)

public: override void InitializeCell(System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataControlFieldCell ^ cell, System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataControlCellType cellType, System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataControlRowState rowState, int rowIndex);

span.span: The to initialize.

param.name: cellType
param.span: 值，指示行的类型（标头、脚注或数据）。

span.span: A value that indicates the type of row (header, footer, or data).
One of the values.

param.name: rowIndex
param.span: 行的索引（索引从零开始）。

span.span: The zero-based index of the row.

summary.span: 将指定的 对象初始化为指定的行状态。

span.span: Initializes the specified object to the specified row state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建指定按钮类型属性并将其添加到集合对象。The method creates the button type that is specified by the property and adds it to the collection of the object. 属性控件设置为`rowIndex`。The property of the control is set to `rowIndex`.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Text { get; set; }
.property instance string Text
Public Overridable Property Text As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置为 对象中每个按钮显示的静态标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the static caption that is displayed for each button in the object.

value.span: 为 中每个按钮显示的标题。

span.span: The caption displayed for each button in the .
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性对象设置为或值，请使用属性显示静态文本中的按钮标题。When the property of a object is set to the or value, use the property to display static text for the caption of the buttons in the . 每个按钮共享相同的标题。Each button shares the same caption. 而不是使用属性来显示中的静态文本对象时，可以使用属性将绑定给数据源中的字段。Instead of using the property to display static text in a object, you can use the property to bind the to a field in a data source. 字段的值将显示为按钮的标题。The values of the field are then displayed as the caption of the buttons. > [!NOTE] > 如果和都设置属性，属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要显示在每个按钮的标题对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the caption to display for each button in a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/CS/buttonfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/VB/buttonfieldvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override void ValidateSupportsCallback ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void ValidateSupportsCallback() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ValidateSupportsCallback ()
public: override void ValidateSupportsCallback();

summary.span: 确定包含在 对象中的控件是否支持回调。

span.span: Determines whether the controls that are contained in a object support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一种帮助器方法，用于确定控件是否包含在对象支持回调。The method is a helper method that is used to determine whether the controls that are contained in a object support callbacks. 此方法被实现为空的方法 （不包含任何代码的方法） 以指示支持回调。This method is implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported. > [!NOTE] > 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is used primarily by control developers.

para.span: 派生自的类类可以重写方法，以指示所包含的字段的控件是否支持回调。

span.span: Classes that derive from the class can override the method to indicate whether the controls that are contained by the field support callbacks.

para.span: 若要指示支持回调，实现方法作为空方法不会引发异常; 否则，与描述为什么不支持回调的有用消息将引发异常。

span.span: To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement the method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
